forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 21F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low around -5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low around 25F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High near 30F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to rain overnight. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening changing to rain late. Low near 30F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High near 0C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
